modName: Basic Starting Gear in Helgen Keep
summary: This mod puts some starting gear in the Warden's chest in Helgen Keep.
descriptionHtml:
NOW AVAILABLE ON SKYRIM SPECIAL EDITION THANKS TO JenModding! Download here:Â http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1135/?


This rather simple mod changes the contents of the Warden's chest in Helgen Keep.
It adds some simple starting gear to the chest and does not effect anything else.
These items aren't overpowered and are early game items just to get you set up for the character build you wish to play.

Updates: The newest version (1.2) has replaced the iron gear with Steel, changed the arrow count from 30 to 70. It has also added a complete set of imperial gear and an imperial sword, I have also added a raise dead spell tome and some necromancer gear.
Requirements: Skyrim and the latest update of Skyrim.

If you enjoy this please endorse.
There shouldn't be any problems but if you have any let me know.
author: JDcrafter
